title: Gray power is a natural resource
author: UTMB Marketing; Communications [https; Www Utmb Edu; Marcom
description: While it's true that some older adults are just tired, in pain, physically and mentally ready to take their hand from the wheel of life, many are not, writes Dr. Victor Sierpina in his newspaper column.
cleaned_text: The Galveston County Daily News, February 24, 2022 While it's true that some older adults are just tired, in pain, physically and mentally ready to take their hand from the wheel of life, many are not, writes Dr. Victor Sierpina in his newspaper column. "I continue to be amazed at the 70-, 80- and 90-year-olds in my practice with sharp minds, mobile albeit slower bodies, and unquenchable
